title: Call Complaints - User
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic User made for the Call Complaints domain.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It must be equal to User.

aliasName.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The alias name of the User to protect privacy.

surname.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The surname of the User.

contactPhone.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The contact phone of the User.

makesComplaints.description: Relationship. Array of Strings (relationships between Entities). The IDs of the Complaints that the User made.
